comment._content: Wow, fascinating to see St. John the Divine so early in its construction!

comment._content: St. John the Divine in the 21st Century: www.geocities.com/SaveTheCathedral/the-ancillary-building... Quite a change!!

comment.author: 17643926@N00
comment._content: The Cathedral looks oddly modern in its unfinished state. Too bad they didn't stop there.
